entities.description: A state where thinking seems slower or mixed up, as asked during the survey.
Difficulty keeping mind on things on most days during the worst period.
Difficulty making up mind about things on most days during the worst period.
Feeling not as good as other people nearly every day during the worst period.
Feeling totally worthless nearly every day during the worst period.

relationships.description: Relates to the respondent's state of thinking slower or mixed up during the worst period.
Indicates that the respondent had more trouble keeping their mind on things on most days during the worst period.
Indicates that the respondent was unable to make decisions that they ordinarily have no trouble deciding during the worst period.
Indicates that the respondent felt not as good as other people nearly every day during the worst period.
Indicates that the respondent felt totally worthless nearly every day during the worst period.
